\title{Homework 7: Partial Fractions I}


\author{Alexander Gould, Section 3}


\date{September 18, 2014}

\maketitle
6.

\[
\boxed{x-9=A\left(x-3\right)+B\left(x+6\right)}
\]


8.

\[
???
\]


9.

\[
\int\frac{dx}{(x-1)(x-2)}=\int\left(\frac{A}{x-1}+\frac{B}{x-2}\right)\qquad A(x-2)+B(x-1)\quad A=-1,B=1\qquad\int\left(\frac{-1}{x-1}+\frac{1}{x-2}\right)=
\]


\[
\boxed{-\ln\left|x-1\right|+\ln\left|x-2\right|+C}
\]


11.

\[
\int\frac{3dx}{x^{2}-1}=3\int\left(\frac{A}{x+1}+\frac{B}{x-1}\right)\qquad A=-\frac{1}{2},B=\frac{1}{2}\qquad3\left(-\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{1}{x+1}+\frac{1}{2}\int\frac{1}{x-1}\right)=\boxed{\ln\left|\frac{x-1}{x+1}\right|^{\frac{3}{2}}+C}
\]


13. 

\[
???
\]


14.

\[
\int\frac{3dx}{x^{3}-x^{2}-12x}=3\int\left(\frac{A}{x}+\frac{B}{x+3}+\frac{C}{x-4}\right)\qquad A=-\frac{1}{12},B=\frac{1}{21},C=\frac{1}{28}\qquad3\left(-\frac{1}{12}\int\frac{1}{x}dx+\frac{1}{21}\int\frac{1}{x+3}dx+\frac{1}{28}\int\frac{1}{x-4}dx\right)
\]


\[
\boxed{3\left(-\frac{\ln\left|x\right|}{12}+\frac{\ln\left|x+3\right|}{21}+\frac{\ln\left|x-4\right|}{28}\right)+C}
\]


19.

\[
\int\frac{3dx}{x^{3}-9x^{2}}=3\int\left(\frac{A}{x}+\frac{B}{x^{2}}+\frac{C}{x-9}\right)=\boxed{3\left(\frac{x\left(\ln\left|9-x\right|-\ln\left|x\right|+9\right)}{81x}\right)+C}
\]


23.

\[
\int\frac{2dx}{x^{3}+x^{2}}=\boxed{2\left(-\frac{1}{x}-\ln\left|x\right|+\ln\left|x+1\right|\right)+C}
\]


24.

\[
\int\frac{2dt}{t^{3}(t+1)}=2\left(\int\frac{1}{x^{3}}-\int\frac{1}{x^{2}}+\int\frac{1}{x}-\int\frac{1}{x+1}\right)=\boxed{2\left(\frac{1}{2x^{2}}-\frac{1}{x}+\ln\left|x\right|-\ln\left|x+1\right|\right)+C}
\]


25.

\[
\int\frac{x-5}{x^{2}(x+1)}dx\qquad x-5=Ax^{2}(x+1)+Bx^{2}+Bx+Cx^{3}\qquad\boxed{\frac{5}{x}+\ln\left|\frac{x}{x+1}\right|^{6}+C}
\]
